Can I use Minecraft on Windows 11?

windows 11 is the latest operating system from Microsoft. It was announced on June 24, 2021. According to Microsoft, Windows 11 will be released later this year. Now users can use the Windows 11 Insiders Preview Build enjoy in the beta channel.

If you’re a game lover, you might be wondering if old games can be played on Windows 11while trying out the new operating system. In the following content you will learn how to download and install Minecraft Windows 10 on Windows 11. Read on for more information.

Minecraft is a video game developed by Mojang Studios in the Java programming language was developed.

According to Minecraft, to run the game on a Windows PC, you need an operating system of Windows 7 or higher, with Windows 10 being recommended for the game. There is no Windows 11 version of Minecraft yet, but you can play the Windows 10 version on Windows 11.

How to get Minecraft on Windows 11?

How to get Minecraft on Windows 11? Before downloading Minecraft on Windows 11, you must first decide which version of Minecraft you want to play.

There are two mainVersions of Minecraft: Windows 10 version and Java version.

The Java version of Minecraft supports cross-platform play on macOS, Linux, and Windows, while the Windows 10 version of Minecraft allows cross-platform play on more devices than the Java version, e.g. B. Xbox, Nintendo Switch, Android and iOS devices.

To download the Windows 10 version, you can visit the Microsoft Store. To get the Java version you need to visit the website.

Now let’s look at them in turn.

Download Minecraft on Windows 11 from the Microsoft Store

The Microsoft Store offers thousands of games for users. To download Minecraft on Windows 11, you can visit the Microsoft Store. Here are the steps.

Step 1: Open the Microsoft Store. In Windows 11, the Microsoft Store is pinned to the taskbar by default. You can click the icon to open it quickly. You can also in the Windows search function Search for and access Microsoft Store.

Step 2: Type Minecraft in the search bar and select the version you want. You may see multiple versions of Minecraft for Windows 10 in the search results. Most of them are paid, but you can choose the free trial version to try them out. The free trial version allows you to play the game for free for 100 minutes.

Step 3: Click the button To install, after selecting the free trial. Then the Microsoft Store will download and install the game for you.

Once it’s installed, you can click the button To play click to play Minecraft on Windows 11.

Download Minecraft on Windows 11 from the website

Alternatively, you can download Minecraft on Windows 11 from the official website, especially if you want the Java version.

Step 1: Open your favorite web browser and type minecraft.net in the address bar to go to the Minecraft website.

Step 2: Click the button GET MINECRAFT . Then choose COMPUTERwhen asked how you want to play the game.

Step 3: Choose personal computer and choose Java Edition. Then click the button MINECRAFT TO BUYto pay and download Minecraft on Windows 11.

Now it’s your turn to choose which method you want to try.

Tip:

You may be wondering if your computer can run Windows 11. Do not worry. Just check the basics Windows 11 system requirements for PCs and laptops.
